Lacivious.page:
...The exhale of release.
Bodies of motion, relax, fall. They part. Palms meet in the middle. A clasp of something shared. The one rolls upon side. The other cuddles, whispers ,,You want to see a story?''
,,Yes, but will I see you once the story is told?''
,,Cover your sight.''
,,...''
,,Is it covered?''
,,Yes.''
,,You hear me?''
,,Yes.''
,,You smell me?''
,,Yes.''
,,You taste me?''
,,Yes.''
,,You feel me?''
,,...''
,,I'm still here.''
,,Why?''
,,Listen and I will show you a story...
